results.content: Excellent course, I think is not for beginners. A good understanding of Object Oriented Programming in JavaScript and ES6 is very useful to get as much as possible from the course but the course is AMAZING! the content is extremely useful! One of the best JavaScript courses that I have taken, no doubt! Thank you Reed!
